title: MESMERIC PRACTICE from Dr. Paret's school
description:
In this video, Dr. Paret's students practice the techniques taught in his Masterclass of non-verbal hypnosis in Brazil. Dr. Paret is the world's leading authority on Mesmerism and Fascination -  the hypnotic power of the gaze and he is sharing his knowledge with his students on his Masterclasses all around the world. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
